front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Digital Test Interchange Format (DTIF)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The information content and the data formats for the interchange of digital test program data between digital automated test program generators (DATPGs) and automatic test equipment (ATE) for board-level printed circuit assemblies are defined. This information can be broadly grouped into data that defines the following: UUT Model, Stimulus and Response, Fault Dictionary, and Probe.
